title: Verde Lda Timor Leste Recycle
description: Verde Lda provides recycle project management and implementation in Timor Lest

home.title: Verde Recycle
home.description: This is the recycle project website for Verde TL.   We are in the process of developing an end to end solution for recyclinng plastics in Timor Leste.  This will be support by Caltech and MDF and other partners.  Verde will focus on the collectionn business and Caltech will focus on production of products from the recycled material.  We shall jointly develop a business opportunity for consumption of the recycled projects.
